info.name: FreeStickers
info.description: Enables you to send custom Stickers without nitro as links, (custom stickers as in the ones that are added by servers, not officiel discord stickers).

changelog.title: v2
items: Plugin Rewrite as per discord new update. Naturally some features are removed because they are impossible to implement

defaultConfig.name: Sticker Size
defaultConfig.note: The size of the sticker in pixels. 160 is recommended.

defaultConfig.name: Send Directly
defaultConfig.note: Send the sticker link in a message directly instead of putting it in the chat box.

defaultConfig.name: Ignore Embed Permissions
defaultConfig.note: Send sticker links regardless of embed permissions, meaning links will not turn into images.

defaultConfig.name: Send animated stickers
defaultConfig.note: Animated stickers do not animate, sending them will only send the first picture of the animation. (still useful)
